webwork-tex.statement:
For the curve given by \(r(t) = \langle 8 \sin(t), 4 t, -8 \cos(t) \rangle\),
\par Find the unit tangent \leavevmode\\\relax \(T(t) = \langle\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}}, \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}}, \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}} \(\rangle\) \par Find the unit normal \leavevmode\\\relax \(N(t) = \langle\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}}, \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}}, \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}} \(\rangle\) \par Find the curvature \leavevmode\\\relax \(\kappa (t) =\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{15ex}{\hrulefill}}
